about_the_game:
What is QualityScaler?

Welcome to QualityScaler, your ultimate solution for enhancing, denoising, and upscaling images and videos using the power of AI.

Similar to Nvidia DLSS, QualityScaler uses powerful AI algorithms to instantly transform low-quality content into high-definition masterpieces.

Whether you're a digital creator, a videomaker, or just a media enthusiast, this intuitive and powerful app is your ideal companion for taking your visual projects to the next level.

Discover a new way to see and create with QualityScaler on Steam today!

Other apps.

FluidFrames - video AI frame generation app

Features.

  • Elegant and easy to use GUI

  • Image and Video upscale

  • Multiple GPUs support

  • Compatible with all GPUs (AMD, Intel, Nvidia)

  • Compatible images - jpg, png, tif, bmp, webp, heic

  • Compatible video - mp4, wemb, mkv, flv, gif, avi, mov, mpg, qt, 3gp

  • Automatic image tilling to avoid gpu VRAM limitation

  • Resize image/video before upscaling

  • Interpolation beetween original file and upscaled file

  • Video upscaling STOP&RESUME

  • PRIVACY FOCUSED - no internet connection required / everything is on your PC

Next steps.

  • Implement new AI models
detailed_description:
What is QualityScaler?

Welcome to QualityScaler, your ultimate solution for enhancing, denoising, and upscaling images and videos using the power of AI.

Similar to Nvidia DLSS, QualityScaler uses powerful AI algorithms to instantly transform low-quality content into high-definition masterpieces.

Whether you're a digital creator, a videomaker, or just a media enthusiast, this intuitive and powerful app is your ideal companion for taking your visual projects to the next level.

Discover a new way to see and create with QualityScaler on Steam today!

Other apps.

FluidFrames - video AI frame generation app

Features.

  • Elegant and easy to use GUI

  • Image and Video upscale

  • Multiple GPUs support

  • Compatible with all GPUs (AMD, Intel, Nvidia)

  • Compatible images - jpg, png, tif, bmp, webp, heic

  • Compatible video - mp4, wemb, mkv, flv, gif, avi, mov, mpg, qt, 3gp

  • Automatic image tilling to avoid gpu VRAM limitation

  • Resize image/video before upscaling

  • Interpolation beetween original file and upscaled file

  • Video upscaling STOP&RESUME

  • PRIVACY FOCUSED - no internet connection required / everything is on your PC

Next steps.

  • Implement new AI models
name: QualityScaler

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx12 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Any CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Directx12 compatible GPU >= 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: -
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: Welcome to QualityScaler, your ultimate solution for enhancing, denoising, and upscaling images and videos using the power of AI (similar to Nvidia DLSS, for images and videos)
